content: twinkle twinkle day 1 / 24 very little star abbreviations chain - chain fpdc - front post double_crochet difficulty mc - magic_ring space - space time 5 min slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material yarnart macrame rope double_crochet - double_crochet hook 3 5 mm written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet ch2 x 5 slip_stitch to the first chain of the round part of the first double_crochet 18 total - 6 double_crochet 12 chain round 2 chain 2 fpdc over the double_crochet from previous round chain 2 single_crochet 2 in the chain space x 6 slip_stitch to the first chain of the round 42 total - 6 fpdc 12 single_crochet 24 chain the double_crochet from previous round chain 2 single_crochet 2 in the chain space x 6 slip_stitch to the first chain of the round 42 total - 6 fpdc 12 single_crochet 24 chain cut the yarn weave the ends in note to achieve more pointy shape pinch the tips of the star possible modification to achieve a bit of a different shape of the mini star - make slip_stitch single_crochet or single_crochet slip_stitch instead of single_crochet 2 in the chain space in round 2 hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the star congratulations you finished the first ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 23 to go
